member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Handles project related requests

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.PerhapsUpdateProjectList(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of projects from the db
member.returns: A list of projects or error details

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.Get
member.summary: Returns the list of projects available to the user
member.returns: List of available projects

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetRandomEntries
member.summary: TEST CODE: generate random project data entries
member.returns: Random project data entries

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.Get(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns the project data for the given project. If geofenceUid is not specified, data for the entire project area is returned otherwise data for the geofenced area is returned. If no date range specified, returns data for the last 2 years to today in the project time zone otherwise returns data for the specified date range.
member.param: Start date in project time zone for which to return data
End date in project time zone for which to return data
member.returns: List of data entries for each day in date range and the status of volume retrieval for the project

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetWeights(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the weights for all geofences for the project for the date range of the last 2 years to today in the project time zone.
member.returns: List of entries for each day in date range and the weight for each geofence for that day

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofenceWeights(LandfillService.Common.Models.Project)
member.summary: Retrieves weights entries for each geofence in the project.
member.returns: List of dates with the weight for each geofence for that date

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.PostWeights(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Saves weights submitted in the request.
member.returns: Project data and status of volume retrieval

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetVolumeInBackground(System.String,LandfillService.Common.Models.Project,System.Collections.Generic.List{LandfillService.Common.Models.WGSPoint},LandfillService.Common.Models.DateEntry)
member.summary: Retrieves volume summary from Raptor and saves it to the landfill DB

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetMissingVolumesInBackground(System.String,LandfillService.Common.Models.Project)
member.summary: Retries volume summary retrieval from Raptor for volumes marked not retrieved

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetVolumesInBackground(System.String,LandfillService.Common.Models.Project,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{LandfillService.Common.Models.DateEntry},System.Action)
member.summary: Retrieves volumes via a background task in batches of 10 parallel requests
member.param: Date entries (providing dates and geofence uids to request)

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetVolumeTimeSummary(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets volume and time summary for a landfill project.
member.returns: Current week volume, current month volume, remaining volume (air space) and time remaining (days)

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofences(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns a list of geofences for the project. A geofence is associated with a project if its boundary is inside or intersects that of the project and it is of type 'Landfill'. The project geofence is also returned.
member.returns: List of geofences

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofenceBoundary(System.UInt32,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a geofence boundary.
member.returns: List of WGS84 boundary points in radians

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetCCA(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets CCA summary for a landfill project.
member.param: Start date in project time zone for which to return data
End date in project time zone for which to return data
member.returns: List of machines and daily CCA %
